attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. it took FOREVER to download. I started downloading it at 8am and it finally finished downloading almost 12 hours later. Once it finished downloading my phone spontaneously combusted in my hand and now i have to get surgery that my insurance wont cover and now i have to pay a whopping $12,000 to get my hand surgery. I have no idea why anyone would vote for this inconsiderate, racist, disgusting and cruel man.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is Literally terrible it almost took a whole day to download every time I open the app it was glitched back to my home screen one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded the app only worked about about once or twice and I have a perfectly good Wi-Fi service and the times it did work my whole phone was the switch to a orange screen is the absolutely horrible app DO NOT download
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app all my information was leaked to hackers and now I have to shut down my phone because of all the viruses I’m getting! I could’ve saved hundred of dollars if I hadn’t downloaded this app, but now I have to get a new phone because this app is not protecting my safety! This app should be shut down IMMEDIATELY I can’t believe it’s even in the app store.
attributes.title: My phone got HACKED because of this app!

attributes.review: This app is terrible. It promotes things that have no place in this country. I cannot believe that this is even allowed to be on the App Store. Besides all the bad things it supports it’s also extremely glitchy and confusing and needs a couple updates to even work properly. I have never downloaded a worse app. PLS don’t download.
attributes.title: If I could rate this any worse I would.

attributes.title: horrible app!!

attributes.review: This took 3 hours to download!! And as soon as I got in the app my phone starting glitching. When I was trying to look at some stuff in the app it would kick me out and it happened every single time I tried. I even tried deleting and reinstalling the app and the same thing kept happening as if the app was about to crash. Will never download again.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I was extremely disappointed by this app. I did not expect this app to have a) a background of a naked Melania AND Donald together b) have all the sections in what seems to be Chinese, c) it seems to have leaked government documents that will randomly pop up? d) a copy of Barack Obama’s birth certificate and e) it left a weird bug on my phone where whenever Siri picks up the word, “Trump” it immediately calls 911...small price to pay for freedom tho!
attributes.title: WOAH

attributes.review: ✨🧚‍♂️✌🏻💫I downloaded the app and then I went to the mall to get some shoes and saw my Friend there 🧚‍♂️✌🏻✨🧚‍♂️ Then we went to protest it was cool 😊 night is a king king 🤴 is a legend of legend he is the king of legends king of king king of the moon and the 🧚‍♂️✌🏻💫✨ moon is a beautiful day in a childhood world war war is king king of the ✨🧚‍♂️✌🏻💫😊 morning was a good day for you and your kids to come home from the house 😁✨🧚‍♂️✌🏻💫 Then the app made a virus on my phone 🤬😡😱 TERRIBLE APP NOW O NEED TO BUY A NEW PHONE!!!! 😡😱🤬
attributes.title: GOT A VIRUS ON MY PHONE 😱🤬😡

attributes.review: This app was the absolute worst. It took forever to download and then my phone began to glitch horribly, my screen stopped responding, and it eventually shut off all together. I now have to take my phone to the store and either purchase a new one or figure out why viruses infected my phone upon downloading!!): My phone, like this nation, was working just fine before Trump:///
attributes.title: Infected my phone with virus

attributes.review: I have tried downloading the app many times but it has stopped the download and does not complete it. After a week the app downloaded. The app has many bugs and need improvements. The creators did not take their time on this app because it is absolutely garbage F for effort. Not to mention this app has too many ads. Overall do not recommend getting this app. Joe Bidden for 2020.
attributes.title: Worst App
